When looking for information about pools and mined blocks, it can be about the latest 24 hours (by default) or about more days
Show notification when BTC reaches an specified price
When notifications are enabled, this app will tell you when the BitCoin price is upper (or lower) than the price you selected (in dolars)
Download the latest version to have new features and get problems solved
Ooops, something failed. Please, help me improving this application sending me a crash report
